import axios from'axios';const API=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';export const register=payload=>axios.post("".concat(API,"/register"),payload).then(r=>r.data);export const applyReferral=payload=>axios.post("".concat(API,"/apply-referral"),payload).then(r=>r.data);export const getUser=userId=>axios.get("".concat(API,"/user/").concat(userId)).then(r=>r.data);// optional if implemented laterexport const awardWin = (payload) =>
export const awardWin=payload=>axios.post("".concat(API,"/win"),payload).then(r=>r.data);
